PredictHic¶

class src.predict_hic.PredictHic(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
class PredictHic¶
This class herits attributes and methods from Hic class and
groups informations about a predicted Hi-C matrix.
predicted_sub_matrices¶

Sub-matrices predicted by a deep-learning model

Type:numpy array
predicted_matrix¶

The reconstructed matrix from the predicted sub-matrices

Type:numpy array
construct_predicted_matrix()[source]¶

Construction and set of the predicted Hi-C matrix from the predicted sub-matrices.

plot_predicted_matrix(color_map, output_path)[source]¶

The reconstructed and predicted Hi-C matrix is plotted in a file.

Parameters:
  • color_map (matplotlib.colors.ListedColormap) – Color map for the plot
  • output_path (str) – Path of the output plot
plot_ten_predicted_submatrices(color_map, output_path, index_list)[source]¶

10 predicted sub-matrices are plotted in a file.

Parameters:
  • color_map (matplotlib.colors.ListedColormap) – Color map for the plot
  • output_path (str) – Path of the output plot
  • index_list (list) – List of the 10 sub-matrix indexes to plot
set_predicted_sub_matrices(predicted_sub_matrices)[source]¶

Set the sub-matrices predicted by a deep-learning model.

Parameters:predicted_sub_matrices (Numpy array) – The predicted sub-matrices
write_predicted_matrix(threshold, output_path)[source]¶

The reconstructed and predicted Hi-C matrix is saved in a sparse matrix file.

Parameters:
  • threshold (float) – The predicted values under the threshold will be set to 0
  • output_path (str) – Path of the output plot
